item.title: 财政赤字担忧意外提振亚洲新兴市场债券
item.description: 担心财政赤字增加的债券投资者正在转向一个不同寻常的避风港：新兴市场。【原文：Bond investors worried about rising fiscal deficits are turning to an unusual haven: emerging markets.】

item.title: 蒂姆-库克不会很快离开，但苹果公司的大调整迫在眉睫
item.description: 虽然蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）暂时不会离职，但苹果公司首席运营官的离职只是更广泛的管理改革的开始。还有公司正在缩减 iOS 26 Liquid Glass 的改版；即将推出的设备一览；Meta 挖走了苹果公司人工智能模型的高级主管。【原文：The departure of Apple’s chief operating officer is just the beginning of a broader management overhaul — though Tim Cook is staying put for now. Also: The company is scaling back the iOS 26 Liquid Glass revamp; a look at upcoming devices; and Meta poaches Apple’s top AI models executive.】

item.title: 英国交通大臣表示，英国计划采取新措施促进电动汽车销售
item.description: 英国计划推出新的激励措施，让人们以更低的价格购买新型电动汽车，因为工党政府正试图逐步淘汰污染严重的汽车销售。【原文：The UK plans to introduce new incentives to make it cheaper for people to buy new electric vehicles as the Labour government attempts to phase out the sale of polluting cars.】

item.title: 世界线动荡让瑞士交易所头疼 3 亿美元
item.description: 罗密欧-拉切尔在 2018 年将瑞士证券交易所 SIX Group AG 的支付服务部门出售给法国公司 Worldline SA 时充满了想法。【原文：Romeo Lacher was full of ideas when he sold the payment services division of Switzerland’s stock exchange SIX Group AG to French firm Worldline SA in 2018.】

item.title: 特朗普周末关税炮火挑战市场韧性
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布从 8 月 1 日起对欧盟和墨西哥征收 30% 的关税后，对美国关税威胁越来越不敏感的金融市场将在周一开盘时面临考验。【原文：Financial markets, which have shown increasing insensitivity to tariff threats from the US, will face a test at the Monday open after President Donald Trump declared a 30% rate for the European Union and Mexico effective Aug. 1.】

item.title: 神秘期权交易让印度重要股指成为焦点
item.description: 随着印度证券监管机构加强对期权市场的审查，一些投资者将与印度基准指数挂钩的合约的神秘走势作为可疑交易活动的证据。【原文：As India’s securities regulator ramps up scrutiny of the options market, some investors are pointing to mysterious moves in contracts tied to the nation’s benchmark index as evidence of questionable trading activity.】

item.title: 习近平的价格战在中国股市引起轰动
item.description: 对于摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）和高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：For strategists at JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Goldman Sachs Group Inc. as well as money managers in Hong Kong and Singapore, an opaque term has suddenly emerged as the catchphrase for deciphering Chinese policy intentions and navigating the stock market.】

item.title: 美国通胀将因更多关税转嫁而回升
item.description: 在经历了数月通胀率极低的情况后，6 月份美国消费者的物价增长可能略有加快，因为公司开始转嫁与关税相关的进口商品的较高成本。【原文：After months of seeing very little inflation, US consumers probably experienced slightly faster price growth in June as companies started to pass along the higher cost of imported merchandise associated with tariffs.】

item.title: 2021 年以来最严重的降级潮预示着痛苦
item.description: 信用评级下调越来越频繁，这是公司业绩开始恶化的最新迹象，也引发了企业债务估值是否应该如此之高的新问题。【原文：Credit rating downgrades are becoming more frequent, the latest sign that companies are starting to perform worse and raising fresh questions about whether corporate debt valuations should be as high as they are.】

item.title: 特朗普组织与罗马尼亚达成协议，扩大与巴尔干地区的联系
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普总统的家族加深与巴尔干地区的联系并寻求一系列新的对外交易，特朗普组织计划将业务扩展到罗马尼亚。【原文：The Trump Organization plans to expand to Romania, as President Donald Trump’s family deepens its ties in the Balkans and pursues a lineup of new foreign deals.】

item.title: 各国争相达成协议，特朗普在关税问题上的耐心荡然无存
item.description: 美国贸易伙伴正努力在唐纳德-特朗普总统所谓的互惠关税实施前的最后几周进行谈判，他们面对的是一位已明确表示对谈判失去耐心的领导人。【原文：US trading partners trying to navigate the final weeks of negotiations before President Donald Trump’s so-called reciprocal tariffs hit are facing a leader who has made clear he’s lost patience with talks.】

item.title: 墨西哥正在谈判避免特朗普的最新关税威胁
item.description: 墨西哥正在与美国谈判，以避免美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁从 8 月 1 日起对拉美国家征收 30% 的关税。【原文：Mexico is negotiating with the US to avoid a set of 30% tariffs that President Donald Trump has threatened to impose on the Latin American country starting on Aug. 1.】

item.title: Memecoin 平台 Pump.fun 在 12 分钟内融资 6 亿美元
item.description: 周六，一个让人们创建自己的高投机性代币的平台在 12 分钟内筹集了 6 亿美元，这也是 memecoins 持续流行的另一个标志。【原文：In another sign of the ongoing popularity of memecoins, a platform that lets people create their own highly-speculative tokens raised $600 million within 12 minutes on Saturday.】

item.title: 德意志银行策略师称鲍威尔下台风险被低估
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）的一位策略师表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普可能解除美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔的职务，这是一个被低估的重大风险，可能引发美元和国债大跌。【原文：President Donald Trump’s potential dismissal of Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell is a major and underpriced risk that could trigger a selloff in the US dollar and Treasuries, a Deutsche Bank AG strategist said.】

item.title: 投资者关注财报季启动的五大主题
item.description: 在短短三个月内，美国股市已从四月份的大幅下挫跃升至新的高度。现在，交易员们要看看美国公司的成绩单是否能证明股市中的乐观情绪是正确的。【原文：In just three months, US stocks have swung from a dramatic April selloff to new heights. Now, traders are about to see if Corporate America’s report cards justify the optimism priced into equity markets.】

item.title: 马卡里在食品及药物管理局发现的 "破绽
item.description:
Marty Makary 担任 FDA 局长已超过 100 天

。【原文：

Marty Makary has been the commissioner of the FDA for more than 100 days

】

item.title: Robinhood 的私募股票代币吸引投资者，也招致质疑
item.description: Robinhood Markets 公司于 6 月 30 日（周一）开始提供 "代币化 "股票（加密货币版的公司股票），希望在欧洲开创一个基于区块链的全天候股票交易新时代，并最终迁移到美国。【原文：Robinhood Markets Inc. started offering “tokenized” equities – cryptocurrency’s version of company shares – on Monday, June 30, hoping to usher in a new, 24-7 era of blockchain-based stock trading in Europe that would, eventually, migrate to the US.】

item.title: 谁还能从叙利亚的战后恢复中获益？
item.description: 在叙利亚十多年的战争期间，许多外部势力都参与其中。现在，对于叙利亚支离破碎的经济来说，希望是至少其中一些国家也希望在叙利亚的复苏中获得利益。【原文：During more than a decade of war in Syria, plenty of external powers got involved. The hope now for the country’s shattered economy is that at least some of them will want a stake in its recovery, too.】

item.title: 天空电视台称劳埃德正洽谈以 1.2 亿英镑收购金融科技公司 Curve
item.description: 据英国天空电视台（Sky）周六报道，劳埃德银行集团（Lloyds Banking Group Plc）正在就收购数字钱包提供商 Curve 进行深入谈判，收购价格高达 1.2 亿英镑（1.62 亿美元）。【原文：Lloyds Banking Group Plc is in advanced talks to buy digital wallet provider Curve for as much as £120 million ($162 million), Sky reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 特朗普重启贸易战，石油市场焦点转向需求
item.description: 尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普混乱的关税策略已经扰乱石油市场数月之久，但他本周对贸易伙伴的再次攻击至少在一个问题上巩固了共识：原油需求前景必将恶化。【原文：While US President Donald Trump’s chaotic tariff strategy has disrupted the oil market for months, his renewed attacks on trading partners this week have solidified consensus on at least one matter: The outlook for crude demand is set to worsen.】

item.title: 全球经济图表：特朗普再次加征关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）针对铜和加拿大重新启动了关税计划，使人们对美国政府正在缩减 4 月份首次宣布的解放日征税的希望落空。【原文：US President Donald Trump ramped back up his tariff plans with an eye on copper and Canada, deflating hopes that the administration was dialing back its initial Liberation Day levies first announced in April.】

item.title: 摩根大通称韩国股市两年内可能接近 5,000 点
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：South Korea’s equity benchmark may rise more than 50% from its current level over a two-year period should corporate governance reforms gain momentum, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 土耳其监管机构扩大零售贷款重组范围
item.description: 土耳其银行监管机构允许更多公民进行债务重组，因为紧缩的货币政策损害了依赖银行卡消费的低收入家庭。【原文：Turkey’s banking regulator allowed more citizens to restructure debt as tight monetary policy hurts low-income households dependent on card spending.】

item.title: 德国在日益减少的劳动力中寻找新兵
item.description: 为了重新武装以应对来自俄罗斯的威胁，德国不惜投入大量资金，但在本已捉襟见肘的就业市场上，却很难招募到足够的新兵。【原文：A Germany flush with cash to rearm against the threat from Russia is struggling to muster sufficient recruits in an already stretched jobs market.】

item.title: 印度简街禁令威胁亚洲历史最悠久的证券交易所反弹 900
item.description: 亚洲历史最悠久的证券交易所正准备庆祝其成立 150 周年，但一场坏消息风暴破坏了庆祝活动。【原文：Asia’s oldest stock exchange was preparing to celebrate its 150th anniversary when a storm of bad news upended the festivities.】

item.title: 墨西哥 Televisa 因用户数量下降被穆迪下调至 "垃圾 "评级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将 Grupo Televisa SAB 的信用等级下调至垃圾级，理由是用户数量下降导致利润减少。【原文：Grupo Televisa SAB’s credit grade was cut to junk by Moody’s Ratings, which cited falling subscriber numbers that have dented profits.】

item.title: 佛罗里达州 "光明线 "列车因困境加剧而推迟支付债券
item.description: 迈阿密和奥兰多之间的私营客运铁路公司 Brightline Trains Florida 正在推迟支付部分债务的利息，因为该公司正在消耗现金以抵消低于预期的乘客量和较高的成本。【原文：Brightline Trains Florida, the private passenger railroad between Miami and Orlando, is deferring interest payments on some of its debt as it burns cash to offset lower-than-expected ridership and higher costs.】

item.title: Meta 收购语音 AI 初创公司 PlayAI，继续增聘人才
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司已完成收购 PlayAI 的交易，这是一家专注于语音技术的小型人工智能初创公司。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. has completed a deal to acquire PlayAI, a small artificial intelligence startup focused on voice technology.】

item.title: OpenAI 30 亿美元收购人工智能初创公司 Windsurf 的交易告吹
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的谷歌公司正在为其人工智能部门招聘来自 Windsurf 的顶尖人才，因为 OpenAI 30 亿美元收购这家人工智能编码初创公司的协议已经破裂。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google is hiring top talent from Windsurf for its artificial intelligence division as OpenAI’s $3 billion agreement to buy the AI coding startup falls apart.】

item.title: 航天器和火箭公司 Firefly Aerospace 申请 IPO
item.description: 萤火虫宇航公司（Firefly Aerospace）是一家总部位于得克萨斯州的初创企业，今年早些时候，该公司的一艘机器人飞船在月球上着陆。【原文：Firefly Aerospace, the Texas-based startup that landed a robotic spacecraft on the moon earlier this year, filed for an initial public offering with the U.S Securities and Exchange Commission on Friday.】
